full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,THU BKVAN RDO RJE 'CHANG GIS MDZAD PA'I NGES DON GYI BLA MA'I GSOL 'DEBS KYI 'GREL PA RTZOM DGOS ZHUS PA'I BKA' LAN BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004B (ZHES PA 'DI NI SEMS NYID BLA MA RJE BLO BZANG MCHOG GRUB NYI MA DPAL BZANG PO NAS, THU BKVAN RDO RJE 'CHANG GIS MDZAD PA'I NGES DON GYI BLA MA'I GSOL 'DEBS KYI 'GREL PA RTZOM DGOS GSUNG BA'I BKA' LAN DU BAN CHUNG RIGS PA SMRA BA DKON MCHOG RGYAL MTSAN GYIS BRIS PA'O,, ,,)
